name: ResponsiveHtml_GetEnvelopeDocumentHtmlDefinitions
description:
Retrieves the HTML definition used to generate a dynamically sized responsive document.

If the document was not created as a signable HTML document, this endpoint will return a 200-OK response and an empty JSON body. 

**Note:** The `documentId` query parameter is a GUID value, not an integer document ID. If an invalid document ID is provided, this endpoint will return a 200-OK response and an empty JSON body.

### Related topics

- [Responsive signing](/docs/esign-rest-api/esign101/concepts/responsive/)

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

documentId.description:
The GUID of the document.

Example: c671747c-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-4a4a48e23744

$ul: **htmlDefinitions**: Holds the properties that define how to generate the responsive-formatted HTML for the document.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
